"It was like he was playing horse tonight," said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists. His jumper was deadly. Using mostly jump shots, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento.
